articles.title: Reception Given for Foreign Diplomatic Envoys, Representatives of Int'l Bodies
articles.content:
Reception Given for Foreign Diplomatic Envoys, Representatives of Int'l Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave a reception for foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here Tuesday on the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Present there on invitation were above-mentioned diplomats.
					
					 Ri Su Yong and other officials of the Foreign Ministry were present there.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets with Cuban, Pakistan Ambassadors
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets with Cuban, Pakistan Ambassadors
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, new Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.
					 He also met with Syed Hasan Habib, outgoing Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK on the same day.

articles.title: Young People Present Artillery Pieces to KPA
articles.content:
Young People Present Artillery Pieces to KPA
 Hamhung, January 12 (KCNA) -- School youth and children presented artillery pieces to the Korean People's Army through the do-good-thing movement on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 A ceremony of presenting artillery pieces Chongnyon Jonwi took place at Hamhung Square Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, service personnel and school youth and children. 
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made an address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They said that artillery pieces reflected the faith of the young people to remain true to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea as vanguard and their patriotic resolution to make a positive contribution to the country's defense capability, small as it may be.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, artillery pieces left for units of the KPA amid send-off by school youth and children and people in the city.

articles.title: Korean People Vow to Register Eye-opening Successes
articles.content:
Korean People Vow to Register Eye-opening Successes
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Joint army-civilian meetings took place in North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and Jagang Provinces and Rason City on Tuesday to hail the successful first H-bomb test conducted by Juche Korea.
					 Present there were officials of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, factories, enterprisers, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people, youths and students.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out and congratulatory speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers recalled that under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the DPRK emerged the world's military power and nuclear weapons state and that today it has proudly joined the advanced nuclear weapons states having access to H-bomb under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. They went on:
					
					 By having access to H-bomb, the DPRK has come to step up creation and construction to realize the people's dreams and ideals, backed by powerful nuclear force.
					
					 They called for steadily achieving world-startling successes like an H-bomb of Songun Korea and thereby glorifying this year when the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held  as a year of gigantic struggle for ushering in a golden age in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: National Art Troupes Intensify Agitation Activities for Increased Production
articles.content:
National Art Troupes Intensify Agitation Activities for Increased Production
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- From the outset of the year artistes of the national art troupes are intensifying agitation activities of frontline-style at factories and enterprises of the leading sectors of national economy. 
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe, the National Theatrical Troupe and the Pyongyang Puppet Company visited the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex to distribute aid-materials and give performances.
					
					 Artistes of the National Folk Art Troupe and the National Circus went to the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant to give peculiar performances. 
					
					 Artistes conducted agitation by loudspeakers and hailed innovators at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Ryongsong Bearing Factory and the Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons. 
					
					 Art squads of national art troupes visited major industrial establishments in Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces for agitation. 
					
					 Artistes' performing activities at the Wonsan Shoes Factory, the Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex, the Munchon Steel Works and Munphyong Smeltery instilled revolutionary enthusiasm and militant spirit into the workers there. 
					
					 They staged performances at the Sinpho Pelagic Fishery Complex and Riwon Fishery Station, calling upon fishermen to make positive contributions to improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Gwon, Indomitable Revolutionary Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Gwon, Indomitable Revolutionary Fighter
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 80th anniversary of the death of Kim Hyong Gwon, an indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					 On this occasion, people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recall with deep emotion the feats he performed for Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, true to President Kim Il Sung's line of waging an anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Hyong Gwon had been intensely loyal to the country and the revolution and the leader's idea and line.
					
					 At the historic Kalun Meeting held in the early period of the Korean revolution, Kim Il Sung set forth the line of armed struggle against the Japanese invaders and formed the Korean Revolutionary Army (KRA) for its implementation. Then he dispatched KRA groups to the homeland in order to expand the armed struggle.
					
					 In August Juche 19 (1930), Kim Hyong Gwon led one of the groups to carry on military and political activities in the northern area of Korea.
					
					 He displayed undaunted fighting spirit to carry through Kim Il Sung's line of armed struggle.
					
					 When he was arrested by the Japanese police due to betrayal of a renegade, he did not abandon his revolutionary faith and unyieldingly fought against the enemies in the teeth of cruel tortures.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lauds H-bomb Test
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lauds H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The news of the success of the first H-bomb test of the DPRK have shocked the world.
					 The test that was carried out in the outset of significant year 2016 in which the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea will be held, is a reflection of the fixed faith and will of the WPK invariably keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism and a bright fruition brought about by the WPK's idea on attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 The test was neither to "threaten" anyone nor to "provoke" someone for a certain purpose. It was a process indispensable for carrying out the WPK's line on simultaneously carrying out the economic construction and the building of nuclear force to cope with the U.S. ever-more undisguised hostile policy toward the DPRK. It was also a normal course that the H-bomb nations have undergone without exception.
					
					 The recent test pursuant to the WPK's strategic line and resolution fully confirmed the accuracy of technical specifications of the new trial H-bomb and scientifically proved the power of the smaller H-bomb. This made it possible to declare with dignity that the nuclear physics of the DPRK has reached a new high stage.
					
					 This also helped the DPRK get fully armed with smaller and standardized H-bombs for ballistic rockets and get possessed of ultra-modern strike means for delivering nuclear bombs of various kinds in the land, sea and air without limitation.
					
					 The recent test laid a solid foundation for keeping the creation and construction going after averting the danger of a war with the help of the strongest deterrence and provided a sure guarantee for reliably safeguarding the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region. Herein lies the historic significance of the H-bomb test.
					
					 Now personages of governments, political and public circles, scientists and technicians of over 100 countries of the world are supporting the DPRK and admiring the spectacular nuclear scientific and technological successes made by it and its nuclear deterrence for self-defence, and even nuclear scientists and experts of the U.S. are acknowledging the remarkable progress made in the nuclear science and technology of the DPRK.
					
					 The scientists and technicians of the DPRK are in high spirit to detonate H-bombs of hundreds of Kt and Mt level capable of wiping out the whole territory of the U.S. all at once as it persistently moves to stifle the DPRK, cradle of life and happiness of its people, if only there are no geographical restrictions and provided the territory is vast.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Single-minded Unity in DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Single-minded Unity in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial says that single-minded unity serves as a symbol of ever-victorious socialist Korea and source of all its victories and miracles.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The history of Korean revolution started from Mt. Paektu is the history of unity in which it has achieved epochal victory and changes despite ordeals by giving fullest play to the mental power of all the servicepersons and people on the strength of the revolutionary ideas of the great leaders. 
					
					 The on-going general advance toward the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is a march of a harmonious whole to win and advance on the strength of the single-minded unity, precious revolutionary heritage handed down by the great leaders. 
					
					 The staunch spirit and invincible might of Songun Korea making a leap forward with dynamism under the leadership of the great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu are based on the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people rallied close around him.
					
					 The single-minded unity served as a weapon for sure victory that has warded off the danger of war and safeguarded the dignity and security of the country with honor and a driving force of creation and construction that has made a new history of dramatic changes. It also served as the basic source of powerful strength that has unfolded a proud reality of our indigenous plane flying in the sky and our indigenous subway train running under the ground.
					
					 An ideological pure entity, an integral organization and the unity of actions in which the leader, servicepersons and people share the same thought, will and destiny--herein lie the firmness and invincible might of the single-minded unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Deceptive Theory of "Threat from North Korea"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Deceptive Theory of "Threat from North Korea"
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Radio Sputnik of Russia raised a question why the U.S. is set to bolster its armed forces deployed in south Korea. It reported that a Russian expert commented that the U.S. is not expanding its military bases owing to the ever-growing threat from north Korea, the U.S. plans to turn south Korea into its overseas military base in a bid to contain geopolitical rival nations, and that the U.S. theory of "threat from north Korea" is no more than a pretext to justify its arms buildup".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is attempting to meet its interests under the pretext of the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 It is a strategy of the U.S. successive ruling quarters to put the Asia-Pacific region under its control and make the world its unipolar world.
					
					 The U.S. regards that if it fails to put the Korean Peninsula under its control, it is impossible to meet its absolute interests in Northeast Asia, maintain the old international order worldwide and hold a leading position and play the role. Therefore, the U.S. works hard to turn south Korea into an important base for deploying military forces overseas in a bid to deter Russia and China and dominate Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. is vociferating about the DPRK's nuclear and missile threat to cover up and justify such purpose.
					
					 The story of "threat" from the DPRK much-touted by the U.S. will bring to light its true colors as the chief culprit who has pushed the situation in the Asia-Pacific region centering on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.

articles.title: Soldiers of S. Korean Army Suffer from Harsh Group Assaults
articles.content:
Soldiers of S. Korean Army Suffer from Harsh Group Assaults
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- There occurred superiors' group assault against a soldier of the south Korean army, sparking uproar. 
					 According to Yonhap News and the paper Kukmin Ilbo of south Korea, a soldier transferred to a marine unit stationed on Paekryong Island was assaulted by a group of his superiors under the pretext of establishing "discipline". 
					
					 This being a hard fact, the high echelon of the military is openly claiming that "violence is a major means for keeping the army in a proper shape."

articles.title: Nullification of Humiliating "Agreement" between S. Korea and Japan Declared by S. Korea Bodies
articles.content:
Nullification of Humiliating "Agreement" between S. Korea and Japan Declared by S. Korean Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps, the Solidarity for Progress and other organizations in south Korea held a rally at Seoul Square on Jan. 9 to declare the humiliating "agreement" on the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army null and void.
					 Speakers strongly denounced the authorities for concluding in hasty the humiliating "agreement", paying no heed to the voices of the victims and people who had demanded a proper liquidation of the crimes related to sexual slavery.
					
					 The authorities should totally nullify the "agreement" aimed at building the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance, they said.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration.
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and public organizations in Kwangju held a similar rally before the statue of girl outside the Kwangju City Office on the same day.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Meet
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a meeting at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Jan. 9 to carry out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and New Year message.
					 A New Year message sent by Kim Jong Un to Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He called upon all the officials of Chongryon to adorn this year as a year of victory which will be recorded in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian, Mexican Bulletins
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian, Mexican Bulletins
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The main contents of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was carried by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in their bulletins between January 4 and 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Sweden, Denmark
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Sweden, Denmark
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a reading session on Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address took place in Sweden and Denmark on January 5.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the group would extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for implementing the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address served as important guidelines indicating the way of the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country. He noted:
					
					 In his New Year Address Kim Jong Un raised the economic development and the improvement of the people's living standard as important tasks and clarified the ways for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the peaceful reunification of the country on the basis of the three principles of national reunification and the north-south declarations.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposals for National Reunification Supported by Political Figures of UK, Ghana
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposals for National Reunification Supported by Political Figures of UK, Ghana
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Political figures of the UK and Ghana issued statements on Jan. 5 and 6 in support of the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), said that very just are the proposals for Korea's reunification and foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government clarified by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 The address makes one know well that the issue of Korea's reunification is a very urgent task of the Korean nation and it is linked with the issue of defending peace on the Korean Peninsula, he noted, adding: The U.S. should conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in his New Year Address clarified the stand of the DPRK government on improving north-south relations and reunifying the country.
					
					 The proposals for national reunification clarified by him are the most fair and aboveboard and reasonable proposals to ensure durable peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and region.
					
					 Fully supporting the principled stand of the party and government of the DPRK, I am convinced that the Korean people will check all challenges by the anti-reunification forces and realize the reunification of the country without fail under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threat Compels DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent: Brazilian Body
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threat Compels DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent: Brazilian Body
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- An article titled "U.S. nuclear threat compels DPRK to bolster nuclear deterrent" was posted by the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on Jan. 6, illustrated with a photo showing the might of the Korean People's Army.
					 The article said that the U.S. imperialists, who used nuclear weapons for the first time in the world, are working hard to impose nuclear disaster on mankind while spurring modernization of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. moves to dominate the world with nuclear weapons have reached the culmination in its nuclear threat against the DPRK, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. planned to use even A-bomb during the past Korean war. After the war it has becoming all the more pronounced in its moves to stifle the DPRK with nuclear weapons as basic means. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrent and steadily bolster it to check the U.S. nuclear blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. ever-growing nuclear threat is the basic factor of compelling the DPRK to bolster nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The U.S. should properly face up to the reality and stop at once its foolish moves for igniting a nuclear war.

articles.title: Russian Paper on Developed Munitions Industry of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Paper on Developed Munitions Industry of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Rossiskaya Gazeta on Jan. 8 carried an article appreciating the developed munitions industry of the DPRK.
					 Noting the DPRK again demonstrated its world-startling technical development level only two days after its successful H-bomb test, the article said:
					
					 Footage of an SLBM launch was screened by the Korean Central TV Broadcasting Service.
					
					 That shows that Juche Korea has advanced far beyond the public imagination in its development of strategic missiles.
					
					 A spokesperson for the U.S. Department of Defense commented that the country of Juche would come to have a submarine equipped with ballistic missiles a year later.
					
					 But south Korea was skeptical about the comment, adding it cannot be appreciated as a remarkable success.
					
					 However, the footage vindicates that the DPRK has registered a really great success.

articles.title: Proposals for National Reunification Favored by Russian, Guinean Organizations
articles.content:
Proposals for National Reunification Favored by Russian, Guinean Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia and Guinea made public statements in support of the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said on Jan. 6:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed that all the Korean people in the north, in the south and abroad will smash all challenges and obstructive moves by the anti-reunification forces in and out of the country and build a dignified and prosperous reunified Korea on this land without fail under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification are the proposals for reunifying Korea independently and peacefully and on the principle of great national unity.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that we will have an open-minded discussion on the reunification issue, one of the national issues, with anyone who is truly desirous of national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 The cause of the Korean nation for the country's reunification will enjoy invariable support.
					
					 The Guinea-Korea Friendship Association on Jan. 5 fully supported the proposals for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 It went on: We strongly demand the south Korean authorities discontinue such a humiliating act as going on a tour of foreign countries touting for "cooperation" in resolving the internal issues of the nation.                                                                                                           
					
					 We also demand that the south Korean authorities not seek pointless confrontation of systems, but make it clear that they intend to respect and implement with sincerity the three principles of national reunification, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration, which crystallize the general will of the nation and whose validity has been proved in practice if they are sincere about improving inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country peacefully.

articles.title: MINREX ofrece banquete en honor de huespedes extranjeros
articles.content:
MINREX ofrece banquete en honor de huespedes extranjeros
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 12 un banquete en honor de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la RPDC. 
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el ministro Ri Su Yong y otros funcionarios de la cancilleria coreana.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con embajadores de Cuba y Pakistan
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con embajadores de Cuba y Pakistan
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, departio el dia 12 con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en la RPDC, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia. 
					El mismo dia, Ri se reunio tambien con el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan en la RPDC, Syed Hasan Habib, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Jovenes y ninos escolares donan canones a EPC
articles.content:
Jovenes y ninos escolares donan canones a EPC
Hamhung, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, fueron donados al Ejercito Popular de Corea los canones preparados mediante el movimiento de los jovenes y ninos escolares de hacer buen trabajo.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en la Plaza de Hamhung la ceremonia de donacion de canones "Vanguardia Juvenil". 
					
					Participaron el secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, los funcionarios interesados, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los jovenes y ninos escolares. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la UJS, Jon Yong Nam, pronuncio la palabra de donacion y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que los canones "Vanguardia Juvenil" reflejan la conviccion y patriotismo de los jovenes y ninos escolares de apoyar en la delantera la direccion del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y contribuir al fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los canones partieron hacia las unidades militares recibiendo la despedida de los jovenes, ninos escolares y trabajadores de la ciudad de Hamhung.

articles.title: Prosiguen mitines para felicitar pleno exito de prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 12 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, Hwanghae del Norte, Jagang y la ciudad de Rason los mitines conjuntos de uniformados y civiles para felicitar el pleno exito de la primera prueba de bomba H de Corea del Songun.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de las instituciones locales del partido y el Poder, las entidades de masas, las fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los habitantes de diferentes estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					En las ocasiones se dieron lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hubo  palabras de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que gracias a contar con el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il la RPDC se ha convertido en la potencia militar de talla mundial y en el pais poseedor de armas nucleares. Prosiguieron que hoy en dia ocupo dignamente la delantera de las potencias nucleares dotada hasta de la bomba H bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Senalaron que con la posesion de la bomba H la RPDC puede acelerar las creaciones y construcciones para realizar los suenos e ideales del pueblo bajo la garantia de las poderosas fuerzas nucleares.
					
					Exhortaron a todos a crear sucesivos exitos asombrantes al mundo para hacer de 2016 en que se convocara el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea un ano de magna lucha para abrir una epoca de esplendor de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
